title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 22.1 - Issuance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 22.1 - Issuance

State Regulations

Certificates of literacy shall be issued in accordance with
this Part as follows: (a) At local
registration, superintendents of schools shall issue certificates of literacy. Such superintendents may act as examiners or may designate teachers, supervisors or principals of public day or evening schools, or college students
in the senior year or of higher rank, so to act. (b) At central registration, central
registration boards shall issue certificates of literacy. Members of such
boards may act as examiners or may designate teachers, supervisors or
principals of public day or evening schools, or college students of the senior
year or of higher rank, to assist with the conduct of the
examination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
22.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
